non_compliant.section: Without Faraday's prior permission, you agree not to display or use in any manner the Faraday Marks.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to withdraw consent - Data subjects have the right to withdraw their consent at any time. It shall be as easy to withdraw as to give consent.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a mechanism for users to withdraw consent for the use of Faraday Marks.

non_compliant.section: The T&Cs constitutes the entire agreement between you and Faraday and governs your use of the Website, superseding any prior version of this T&Cs between you and Faraday with respect to the Website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR does not directly address the concept of entire agreement clauses. However, it is generally advisable to ensure that such clauses do not infringe upon data subjects' rights under the GDPR.
non_compliant.amend: Review the entire agreement clause to ensure it does not contradict or limit data subjects' rights under GDPR.

non_compliant.section: You also may be subject to additional terms and conditions that may apply when you use or purchase certain other service through this Website, affiliate services, third-party content or third-party software.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject - The controller shall provide the data subject with information about the source of the personal data and, where appropriate, whether it comes from publicly accessible sources.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the additional terms and conditions that may apply and provide clear information about the processing of personal data by affiliate services, third-party content providers, or third-party software.
